soldier: when the city fell, after a long siege, came the time of savagery, what did you do on this cruel night?
you took part in the rapes and looting
you refused to give in to your vile instincts
you discovered that some of your officers were engaged in illegal smuggling, so you
kept your tongue, on a condition

quick thinking and a lot of tactical insight
unshakable will and a last stand with your brothers
a blade flashed before your eyes and then the silence, when you woke up, the battle was over, and your brothers gone
you remained dead to the world and took a new name
you were sent in an exotic land, far behind the borders of damad, you had many tales to tell after that
tales of harsh deserts and lethal jungles
tales of golden city states and lustful courtesans
an old soldier took you under his wing upon noticing your talent for surviving on the battlefield
despite his age, he was still an amazing swordsman
he taught you many things about the places he visited

strangely, this experience made you close friends
after that, your rivalry turned into bitter hostility
you displayed incredible heroism in battle, whether martially or strategically
your deeds went unnoticed by your superiors
